data.message: Hi I got a private message stating it was from someone who is head honcho at Facebook lottery, I've never heard of Facebook lottery please tell me if & what I've won as they said I was a winner! Of what I have absolutely no idea X

replies.message: Thank you Steve Boehm do I detect some sarcasm lol,seriously though I appreciate your words & you are very much correct when you say 'if it sounds too good to be true, it probably is' I just needed reminded of that, again many thanks :)
